list-item.p: The training set contains m samples where all x inputs are patches from the images and y outputs are an element of a set comprising of only two values, 1 (The grain boundary) and -1 (others).
Initialize all weights of the samples to 1 divided by the number of patches ( m).
From t = 1 to T classifier, fit it to the training data (where each prediction is either -1 or 1) and select the classifier with the lowest weighted classification error.
